subject: Shutdowns (Institutional)
Layoffs and Job Reductions
lead_paragraph: The demise of Grantland, a sports and culture website, had its roots in the decision by ESPN’s president not to renew Bill Simmons’s contract in May.
snippet: The demise of Grantland, a sports and culture website, had its roots in the decision by ESPN’s president not to renew Bill Simmons’s contract in May.
